article.title: Thales to Modernize Singapore's Mine Countermeasure Vessels
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: The Defence Science and Technology Agency of Singapore has awarded Thales with the Life Extension Program of its four Bedok-class mine countermeasure vessels. Thales will provide an advanced, integrated mine countermeasure combat system, including the mine information system, a hull-mounted sonar, a towed synthetic aperture sonar and expendable mine disposal systems.
